channel.title: [PI] NPCs With Melee Attack
channel.description: I currently have found out that my NPCs that are called for melee attacks, will hit 0s every single hit even if we change everything around in NPCHandler. You will have 1 def and, lets say bork, bork will hit 0s constantly. Can anyone help?

item.title: [PI] NPCs With Melee Attack
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

I currently have found out that my NPCs that are called for melee attacks, will hit 0s every single hit even if we change everything around in NPCHandler. You will have 1 def and, lets say bork, bork will hit 0s constantly. Can anyone help?

Read full topic
